Mint Social | Social Media Marketing & Online Branding

Mint Social is a social media and content marketing company that establishes a presence for businesses in the fastest growing segment of the Internet. The word empowerMint embodies empowering a business to understand why social media and online branding is critical to their online marketing initiatives and Mint represents the results; fresh ideas blended into traditional marketing channels. Mint Social is part of Tventure, LLC that was established in 1998 and is committed to evangelize social media marketing for businesses by providing the knowledge and tools that make online marketing work. We have been instrumental at assisting businesses with the achievement of their growth strategies.
World Webinar Network | Social Media Marketing Seminars and Webinars

World webinar network is for business owners and entrepreneurs looking for education through live and online interactive formats. Our mission is to create an ongoing platform for education where members participate and apply best in class sales, marketing and lead generation technology through social media marketing and online networking.

Social media technology company specializing in search marketing optimization through blogs. Company has developed a social media optimization process and a blog technology that simplifies the technical aspects of blogging and social media to make it easy for any online business to promote their brand and drive traffic to an existing website.

The Checkered Flag Run Foundation (CFRF) is a non-profit organization provides diverse educational programs that impact under-served students and veterans. CFRF provides access to quality educational opportunities through fund-raising programs and events "that ensures the investment of every student and Veteran getting to cross the “finish line”."The CFRF’s programs include:- The Bridge Forum: a panel forum of law enforcement and community luminaries that seeks solutions and best practices for law enforcement professionals,- Phoenix Tools 4 School: a school supply drive for students in need,- Veteran's Reach to Teach: a program designed to hire veterans and family members of veterans with a bachelor’s degree to be guest substitute teachers within Arizona and Veteran's Reach to Teach Christmas in May Toy Drive.- Voting for Veterans: an engagement and get out to vote program to elect and support veterans and the issues important to the veteran community.The CFRF’s events include:Celebrate Arizona: to promote Arizona’s diverse content by marketing events that Celebrate Arizona throughout the year.HeroZona: bringing together veterans to celebrate several events, including NaVoba Veteranpreneur Awards, Veteran/Corporation Matchmaking, Networking, Job Fair, Veteran’s Day Parade, Concert and NASCAR events over Veterans Day weekend in Phoenix.

summary: With over 20 years of experience in the digital media world, Matthew has worked for and with Fortune 500 businesses and has built companies from start up stage to exit strategy. He recently helped develop an insight engine platform to bridge the gap between search, social, pay-per-click and mobile marketing to maximize the visibility, relevancy and predictive online marketing success of businesses. In addition to founding MINT Social, Matthew has developed educational curriculum for Universities on social media for businesses, is a founding board member of the Arizona Interactive Marketing Association (AZIMA) and founder of World Webinar Network. Matthew is a mentor with ASU Entrepreneurship and Innovation Group, a speaker on social media and digital marketing and is a subject matter expert with many online portals.Specialties: Digital marketing, content engine architect, mobile first strategy, progressive web apps, AMP + Google AdWords, local advertising/marketing, digital marketing strategy, search engine marketing and optimization, online branding and social media/content marketing implementation for businesses.
name: Matthew O'Brien
title: Digital Marketing Strategist | Non-profit Activist | Machine Learning and Business Intelligence Integrator
